channel.title: CVE Feed for Siemens -- SIMATIC CP 442-1 RNA
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Siemens -- SIMATIC CP 442-1 RNA

item.title: CVE-2022-27640|2024-08-03T05:32:59.808Z -- siemens -- simatic%20cp%20442-1%20rna
item.description: A vulnerability has been identified in SIMATIC CP 442-1 RNA (All versions < V1.5.18), SIMATIC CP 443-1 RNA (All versions < V1.5.18). The affected devices improperly handles excessive ARP broadcast requests. This could allow an attacker to create a denial of service condition by performing ARP storming attacks, which can cause the device to reboot.
